verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Created from dust
You came and You lived among us
Taken on our frame, You walked in our pain
And now You're taking us higher

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You stepped into time
You laid down Your life to save us
You took on our shame on the cross it was laid
And now You're taking us higher

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
We go from glory to glory to glory
We'll never be the same, never be the same
We go from glory to glory to glory
We're forever changed, forever changed

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You called Your friend
Brought into Your endless kingdom
By the blood I was made, no longer a slave
And now You're taking us higher

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
We go from glory to glory to glory

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Until we reach the day love conquers everything
We'll cry an anthem singing holy, holy
And when we see that day we're standing face to face
We'll shout an anthem singing holy, holy

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
You took on the grave
So not even death can shake us
See the victor has won and Heaven has come
Now You're taking us higher
Now You're taking us higher

verse.name: c3
verse.lines:
We go from glory to glory to glory
We'll never be the same, never be the same
You take us higher and higher and higher
We're forever changed, forever changed
